_sText:
Installation:
Assuming you have steam on C: the default location will be
C:\Program Files(x86)\Steam\steamapps\yoursteamid\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
Place all 3 files (.nav .bsp .txt) in there.

Special thanks to all who have tested this map through its various stages of development.

Any feedback would be much appreciated and of course if you have any problems be sure to let me know :) 

Please do not decompile or Re-release without permission.
